description: System-generated primary key for this tool record; unique, non-business identifier used for internal references and joins.
Business identifier for the tool (tool number/code) used by operations and external integrations; may appear on labels and work orders.
Human-readable description of the tool or its intended use, displayed in user interfaces and reports.
Status code representing the toolâ€™s lifecycle or availability (e.g., active, inactive, retired, lost); values are from a lookup; confirm with SME.
Free-text notes about the tool, such as condition, usage restrictions, or administrative remarks.
System timestamp of the most recent update to this record, regardless of the actor.
Likely timestamp of the last user-initiated modification to this record; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user account that created this tool record.
Timestamp when this tool record was initially created.
Identifier of the user account that most recently modified this tool record.
Timestamp of the most recent user-initiated modification to this tool record.
